content:
Now it's my turn. Here's my response:

I think I'll go with the Neutrogena Hydrating Facial Care Set. I've heard good things about their products, and it seems like a great value for the price. By the way, speaking of good values, I managed to snag a great deal on a high-end kitchen appliance for my friend's wedding gift recently. It was originally $300, but I got it for $220, which I think is a steal.
